Hi, I'm Aravind Balineni!

With a decade of experience in automation development, web development, and scripting, I specialize in UiPath products for automation and possess a strong command of Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Passionate about efficiency and innovation, I thrive on crafting solutions that elevate user experiences and drive tangible results.
